targets.query: SELECT sum("value")  FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("instance" = '0' AND "type_instance" =~ /(interrupt|system|softirq|steal|user|wait|nice)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("instance" = '1' AND "type_instance" =~ /(interrupt|system|softirq|steal|user|wait|nice)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE ("type_instance" =~ /(free|cached|buffered)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "swap_value" WHERE ("type" = 'swap' AND "type_instance" = 'free') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "swap_value" WHERE ("type" = 'swap' AND "type_instance" = 'free') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
